name: admin_serviceAnnouncement_CreateMessages
description: Create new navigation property to messages for admin

$ul: **id**: The unique idenfier for an entity. Read-only.
**details**: Additional details about service event. This property doesn't support filters.
**endDateTime**: The end time of the service event.
**lastModifiedDateTime**: The last modified time of the service event.
**startDateTime**: The start time of the service event.
**title**: The title of the service event.
**actionRequiredByDateTime**: The expected deadline of the action for the message.
**attachmentsArchive**: The zip file that contains all attachments for a message.
**contentType**: The type of the content. Possible values are text and html.
**hasAttachments**: Indicates whether the message has any attachment.
**isMajorChange**: Indicates whether the message describes a major update for the service.
**services**: The affected services by the service message.

**tags**: A collection of tags for the service message. Tags are provided by the service team/support team who post the message to tell whether this message contains privacy data, or whether this message is for a service new feature update, and so on.

**viewPoint**: Represents user viewpoints data of the service message. This data includes message status such as whether the user has archived, read, or marked the message as favorite. This property is null when accessed with application permissions.
**client-request-id**: Client request Id as sent by the client application.
**request-id**: Request Id as tracked internally by the service
**client-request-id**: Client request Id as sent by the client application.
**request-id**: Request Id as tracked internally by the service
